name: Out Of The Darkness (Frozen Well Studios)
name_original: Out Of The Darkness (Frozen Well Studios)
description:
Out Of The Darkness

This is my entry to Jamoween 3 an 8 day game jam run by Indie Game Squad, the theme for the jam was "Your worst fears and nightmares".

I went with a fear of the dark and the nightmare creatures that it hides.

The game takes inspiration from games like Ghost 'n Goblins, Ghouls 'n Ghosts and Frankenstein.

Battle your way to the end and defeat the Boss.

The jam version of the game has 1 level, currently with just 1 enemy and boss, further releases will expand on this.

Controls - Keyboard or game pad

Left - A 

Right - D

Up - W 

Down - S 

Jump - Space

Attack - Ctrl
